text: Purfleet railway station is on the London, Tilbury and Southend Railway line serving the town of Purfleet, Essex. It is down the line from London Fenchurch Street and it is situated between to the west and to the east. Its three- letter station code is PFL. It was opened in 1854. The station and all trains serving it are currently operated by c2c. Although outside London fare zone 6, the station became part of the Oyster card pay-as-you-go network in 2010. == Services == The typical off-peak service frequency is: * 2 trains per hour (tph) westbound to London Fenchurch Street; * 2 tph eastbound to .
